Deprecated API

Deprecated Methods
com.eteks.awt.PJAFontMetrics.getCharOffsetAtBaseline(char)
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAFontData.getCharOffsetAtBaseline (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAFontMetrics.getCharPixels(char)
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAFontData.getCharPixels (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAFontMetrics.getCharPixelsWidth(char)
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAFontData.getCharPixelsWidth (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAToolkit.getDefaultFont()
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAGraphicsManager.getDefaultFont (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAToolkit.getFontsDirectory()
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAGraphicsManager.getFontsDirectory (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAToolkit.loadFonts()
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAGraphicsManager.loadFonts (). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAToolkit.loadFonts(String)
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJAGraphicsManager.loadFonts (String). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAToolkit.main(String[])
          As of PJA version 1.1, replaced by PJANativeToolkitComparison.main (args). 
com.eteks.awt.PJAFontPeer.main(String[])
          As of PJA version 1.1, PJAFontPeer main () method moved to com.eteks.tools.fontcapture.PJAFontCapture. 
com.eteks.awt.PJAFontMetrics.setFont(Font)
          As of PJA version 1.1, PJAFontPeer doesn't need it anymore. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.eteks.awt.PJAComponentPeer()
          As of PJA version 1.2, should use PJAComponentPeer (Component) constructor or PJAMenuComponentPeer (MenuComponent) constructor instead. 
com.eteks.awt.PJALightweightPeer()
          As of PJA version 1.2, should use PJALightweightPeer (Component) constructor instead.
